exportSchemas.description: make all schema root types into an exportable file

exportTypeDefs.description: Take all typeDefs and make them exportable

generateSchemaJson.description: Generate a schema.json file in the queries folder based on the RootType

generateServiceBindings.description: Generate GraphQL bindings for your each schema

init.description: Scaffold the directory structure for the types repo

mergeSchemas.description: merge all types from the Schemas directory and combine them into a single RootType.ts
